name: southwind
description: Example LOB application using Signum Framework and React

scripts.build-development: yarn run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.dll.js && webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build-production: yarn run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.dll.js --mode=production && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production
scripts.watch: yarn run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.dll.js && webpack --config webpack.config.js --watch

author: Signum Software
